title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
I joined Loop during a pivotal phase as the company transitioned from outsourced development to building an in-house engineering team. This opportunity allowed me to drive key platform enhancements and establish processes to improve collaboration across the organization.

Key Highlights:
 • Led major client projects, including a large-scale Takealot integration, recognized as one of Loop’s most successful technical endeavors.
 • Designed and implemented a System Monitoring Framework, enabling proactive decision-making through data insights.
 • Worked closely with cross-functional teams to refine processes, improve workflows, and enhance user experiences.

title: Co-founder
description:
Co-Founded LEKR SERVICES to provide freelance software development services while building an internal product aimed at automating business tools for small to medium-sized enterprises. This experience involved acquiring clients, understanding their business needs, and delivering tailored technical solutions.

Key Highlights:
 • Built strong client relationships across various industries, translating business needs into scalable solutions.
• Delivered custom software that provided tangible value, improving client workflows and business operations.
 • Developed an internal tool to automate key business functions like quote generation, invoicing, and lead management, enhancing efficiency for SMEs.
 • Gained valuable business acumen, managing client interactions and leading end-to-end solution delivery

title: Full Stack Software Engineer
description:
At MOHARA, an international consultancy with development hubs across the UK, South Africa, and Thailand, I progressed from Full Stack Engineer to Project Tech Lead. I led projects from initial concept to successful product launch across various industries, including FinTech, HealthTech, and PropertyTech.

Key Highlights:
 • Led and managed diverse teams, guiding projects from ideation to market launch.
 • Worked closely with clients to translate business requirements into technical solutions, conducting solution design sessions.
 • Gained experience across multiple industries, quickly adapting to the unique challenges of each sector.
 • Played a pivotal role in business development by fostering relationships with clients and identifying new opportunities.

title: Intern
description:
During my internship at SOLIDitech, I gained practical experience in real-world software development projects while balancing my university studies. I worked directly with different teams across the business, contributing to production code and client projects.

Key Highlight:
 • Co-led the development of an internal testing tool featuring a browser-based Java compiler with automated code testing and feedback. This tool remains a key part of the company’s recruitment process today.

This hands-on experience provided a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end development, as well as client interaction and delivering value-driven solutions.
